summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Airfit Pore Primer, (2PCS) Face Makeup Primer, Big Pores Perfect Cover, Skin Flawless and Glowing, Oil Control Moisturizing Essence Concealer Foundation - 35g
Review Date: 2020/04/17
Store: KEQIUSHA
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KEQIUSHA', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Specialty': 'Oil control, Moisturizing', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '6.22 x 3.58 x 1.25 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '882569326636'}
Review Text: I like the idea of a primer before I apply my makeup or foundation.  This cream is pretty lightweight, and has a slight pleasant smell. The primer helps reduce big pores, and soften dry skin. And also gives me a pink glow. When I apply my foundation, it doesn't look spotty, or dry. The primer makes it look smooth and even. I think it's a good deal for a 2-pack. I would buy this again.
Review Title: Makes my foundation go on smooth and even.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Patches Forehead Wrinkle Remover Strips, Anti-Wrinkle Pads, Facial Wrinkle Patches, Anti Face Wrinkle Pads, Overnight Smoothing Forehead Wrinkle Resistant Masks Pads for Men and Women, 10 PCS
Review Date: 2020/04/17
Store: Alivin
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 3.9 x 1.4 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '782905213463'}
Review Text: After a week of using these, I changed my review. These do not work at all. Will be sending back for a refund.
Review Title: Apply at night, take off in the morning.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 20 pieces No Bend Hair Clips, No Crease Dent Hair Clips, Curl Pin Clips, Makeup Hair Clips for Hairstyle Makeup Application
Review Date: 2020/04/23
Store: mwellewm
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.5 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '788807087027'}
Review Text: These are so cute. Perfect size for my baby fine hair. No problem with them staying in all day. 5 colors, 2 pairs each. And very affordable price.
Review Title: works great on baby fine hair.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 24K Gold Eye Treatment Masks - Under Eye Patches, Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment, Under Eye Bags Treatment, Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes, Anti-Wrinkle, Undereye Dark Circles, Gel Pads 10 Pairs
Review Date: 2020/05/01
Store: SSY
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SSY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Wrinkles Treatment', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 5.93 Ounces'}
Review Text: These eye patches surround the whole eye. They are not like the ones that just go under the eye. Easy to apply, and stay put until you are ready to take them off. They make your eyes refreshed. Works well on dark circles,  and fine lines. Will add this to my beauty list of must haves.
Review Title: Surrounds the whole eye.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual's purchase history reveals a clear preference for skincare and beauty products aimed at enhancing appearance and addressing skin concerns. Consistently high ratings accompany products that effectively deliver results, such as those improving foundation application and reducing the appearance of fine lines. However, dissatisfaction arises with ineffective products, indicating an expectation for efficacy.

Common themes involve a focus on makeup preparation, anti-aging solutions, and convenience in use (e.g., overnight treatments). The shopper shows a preference for lightweight and moisturizing products that offer oil control, reflecting sensitivity to skin conditions like acne.

Quality preferences lean towards reliable and effective items, as seen in favorable reviews for well-functioning products, while lower ratings signify sensitivity to product performance. Price sensitivity is evident, as the buyer appreciates products that offer value, such as multi-packs at affordable prices, indicating a preference for cost-effective options.

In summary, this person's core preferences center around efficacy in skincare and makeup application, a strong focus on skin health, value for money, and a favorable impression of lightweight products conducive to a smooth, flawless look.

target_interaction.title: sweatproof, and waterproof.
target_interaction.text: I've never been any good with make-up.  I just can't seem to do my eyebrows right. This has a brush that is shaped in 4 sections. It goes on just like microblading. Looks pretty real. It's sweatproof and waterproof. So it lasts almost all day. It took me a few times to get it right, but I think it looks natural.
target_interaction.title_meta: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen,Waterproof & Smudge-Proof Microblading Eyebrow Pencil,Long-lasting Waterproof Brow Gel,Four Tips Micro-Fork Tip Applicator Creates Natural Looking Brows Effortlessly
